faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about my services

questions.question: How long does a typical project take?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary: Basic packages take 10 days, Standard packages take 21 days, and Premium projects take 30+ days depending on complexity.

questions.question: What happens if I need changes after the project is completed?
questions.answer: Minor adjustments within the original scope are covered during the 30-day warranty period. Major changes or new features can be quoted separately.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer optional maintenance packages starting at $50/month, including security updates, backups, and technical support.

questions.question: Can I update the website content myself?
questions.answer: Yes! All websites include a user-friendly content management system (CMS) that allows you to update text, images, and pages easily.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: I accept bank transfers (TÃ¼rkiye), credit/debit cards, cryptocurrency (USDT, BTC), and Wise for international payments.

questions.question: Do you work with international clients?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and can accommodate different time zones for communication.

questions.question: What makes your technology stack special?
questions.answer: Using React + Supabase provides a perfect balance of performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. It's modern, secure, and easy to maintain.

questions.question: Can you help with website content and copywriting?
questions.answer: While I focus on technical development, I can recommend professional copywriters or help you structure your content effectively.
